text.autoconfig.searchable.title: Searchable Options
text.autoconfig.searchable.option.resele: Whether the latest selected option should remain selected after being hidden and later unhidden due to search query changes.
text.autoconfig.searchable.option.highli: Whether the text that matches a search query should be highlighted.
text.autoconfig.searchable.option.keybin: Whether key bind category names should be scanned for matching text during a search.
Whether the keys bound to their respective key binds should be scanned for matching text during a search.
text.autoconfig.searchable.option.select: Whether world details should be scanned for matching text during a search.
Whether the server selection screen's title should be changed to be consistent with the name of the singleplayer world selection screen.
Whether server descriptions should be scanned for matching text during a search.
